metadata.title: Columbia Sportswear Womens Silver Ridge Plaid Long Sleeve Shirt
features: 62% polyester/38% supplex nylon Silver Ridge plain weave. 53% nylon/47% Tactel nylon Silver Ridge ripstop
Pockets with Hook and Loop Closure
description: Designed to keep you dry, protected and comfortable during long active days in the sun, this Columbia classic features quick-wicking material, strategic venting, stretch construction and built-in UPF 50 blocking power.
